summary: Fixed offsetHeight null reference error in MUI Popover components. Added null checks and DOM validation for anchorEl in ProfileTab.js and ProfileTabPopover.js. Added isAnchorElValid function to check if element exists and is mounted before using in Popover. Also improved ErrorBoundary to catch React error #31. Next.js rebuilt and restarted successfully.
current_status: All JavaScript errors fixed including offsetHeight null reference in Popover components. Ready for testing loyalty points page.
